lore: Yetis were created by Azural thousands of years ago, but their numbers have been drastically reduced over the ages, especially due to hunting.\n\nChillbreeze Yetis dislike eating warm, freshly-caught prey. Before they put it in their mouths, they first place it near a snowstorm to let it cool, and usually they do not eat it until it looks like a block of ice and frost.
menagerieDialog: (It yawns loudly before smacking its lips. Torun would hate this creature.)
(Its fur is meant to help it endure harsh, cold climates. It must be overheating in the confines of this castle.)
(It brings its face close to you and nudges its nose against yours. Ugh.)
(You often wonder if there's a market for fresh Yeti fur.)
(It's chewing on a large piece of fruit. Where did that even come from?)
name: Chillbreeze Yeti
